name: 大卫·达斯马齐连 David Dastmalchian
movies: 蚁人2：黄蜂女现身 Ant-Man and the Wasp
intro:
David Dastmalchian is originally from Kansas. He moved to Chicago, IL, to study acting at The Theatre School, DePaul University. After college, David worked as a professional fisherman in Alaska, a circus performer, movie theatre usher and playwright. He is an ensemble member of Shattered Globe Theatre Company and Caffeine Theatre in Chicago.　　David Dastmalchian was preparing to play college football on the east coast when he received a...(展开全部)
　　David Dastmalchian is originally from Kansas. He moved to Chicago, IL, to study acting at The Theatre School, DePaul University. After college, David worked as a professional fisherman in Alaska, a circus performer, movie theatre usher and playwright. He is an ensemble member of Shattered Globe Theatre Company and Caffeine Theatre in Chicago.　　David Dastmalchian was preparing to play college football on the east coast when he received an unexpected scholarship to study acting in Chicago.
hezuo: 鲍比·坎纳瓦尔 Bobby Cannavale
伊万杰琳·莉莉 Evangeline Lilly
迈克尔·道格拉斯 Michael Douglas
